title: Communication
content: I always try to reach a mutual understanding. I ask for feedbacks and take time to listen to others.

title: Transparence
content: I go straight to the point, speak the truth and I’m open about my intentions. I open source my work whenever I can.

title: Care
content: I want good for people and act for it. I share with my teammates and create things are genuinely good for users and customers.

title: Ownership
content: I own my work and the means to do it. The trust and freedom to make the best decisions for my projects and my life. The responsibility and self discipline to be accountable for the outcomes.

title: Quality
content: I care for the things I do. I want my work to be durable and made with long term thinking.

title: Simplicity
content: I strongly believe that less is more. I avoid unnecessary complexity for me, my teammates and users. Whatever I do I always ask myself “Can it be simpler ?”.

title: Curiosity
content: I'm passionate about my work. I constantly research the ways to understand things better. The why, what and how will always be asked.
